verses.verse: וַ֠יָּבֹאוּ <S%H935><s%> And there came שְׁנֵ֨י <S%H8147><s%> two הַמַּלְאָכִ֤ים <S%H4397><s%> angels סְדֹ֙מָה֙ <S%H5467><s%> to Sodom בָּעֶ֔רֶב <S%H6153><s%> at even וְל֖וֹט <S%H3876><s%> and Lot יֹשֵׁ֣ב <S%H3427><s%> sat בְּשַֽׁעַר־ <S%H8179><s%> in the gate סְדֹ֑ם <S%H5467><s%> of Sodom וַיַּרְא־ <S%H7200><s%> seeing לוֹט֙ <S%H3876><s%> and Lot וַיָּ֣קָם <S%H6965><s%> [them] rose up לִקְרָאתָ֔ם <S%H7125><s%> to meet וַיִּשְׁתַּ֥חוּ <S%H7812><s%> them and he bowed אַפַּ֖יִם <S%H639><s%> himself with his face אָֽרְצָה׃ <S%H776><s%> toward the ground

וַיֹּ֜אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said הִנֶּ֣ה <S%H2009><s%> behold נָּא־ <S%H4994><s%> Now אֲדֹנַ֗י <S%H113><s%> Behold now my lords ס֣וּרוּ <S%H5493><s%> turn in נָ֠א <S%H4994><s%> please אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about בֵּ֨ית <S%H1004><s%> house עַבְדְּכֶ֤ם <S%H5650><s%> I pray you into your servant's וְלִ֙ינוּ֙ <S%H3885><s%> and tarry all night וְרַחֲצ֣וּ <S%H7364><s%> and wash רַגְלֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H7272><s%> your feet וְהִשְׁכַּמְתֶּ֖ם <S%H7925><s%> and ye shall rise up early וַהֲלַכְתֶּ֣ם <S%H1980><s%> and go לְדַרְכְּכֶ֑ם <S%H1870><s%> on your ways וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <S%H559><s%> And they said לֹּ֔א <S%H3808><s%> No כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> in בָרְח֖וֹב <S%H7339><s%> in the street נָלִֽין׃ <S%H3885><s%> all night

וַיִּפְצַר־ <S%H6484><s%> And he pressed בָּ֣ם מְאֹ֔ד <S%H3966><s%> upon them greatly וַיָּסֻ֣רוּ <S%H5493><s%> and they turned in אֵלָ֔יו <S%H413><s%> to him וַיָּבֹ֖אוּ <S%H935><s%> unto him and entered אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about בֵּית֑וֹ <S%H1004><s%> into his house וַיַּ֤עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> and he made לָהֶם֙ מִשְׁתֶּ֔ה <S%H4960><s%> them a feast וּמַצּ֥וֹת <S%H4682><s%> unleavened bread אָפָ֖ה <S%H644><s%> and did bake וַיֹּאכֵֽלוּ׃ <S%H398><s%> and they did eat

טֶרֶם֮ <S%H2962><s%> Before יִשְׁכָּבוּ֒ <S%H7901><s%> But before they lay down וְאַנְשֵׁ֨י <S%H582><s%> the men הָעִ֜יר <S%H5892><s%> of the city אַנְשֵׁ֤י <S%H582><s%> [even] the men סְדֹם֙ <S%H5467><s%> of Sodom נָסַ֣בּוּ <S%H5437><s%> round עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and הַבַּ֔יִת <S%H1004><s%> the house מִנַּ֖עַר <S%H5288><s%> and young וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against זָקֵ֑ן <S%H2205><s%> both old כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> all the people מִקָּצֶֽה׃ <S%H7097><s%> from every quarter

וַיִּקְרְא֤וּ <S%H7121><s%> And they called אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to לוֹט֙ <S%H3876><s%> unto Lot וַיֹּ֣אמְרוּ <S%H559><s%> and said ל֔וֹ אַיֵּ֧ה <S%H346><s%> Where הָאֲנָשִׁ֛ים <S%H376><s%> are the men אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who בָּ֥אוּ <S%H935><s%> which came in אֵלֶ֖יךָ <S%H413><s%> about הַלָּ֑יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> night הוֹצִיאֵ֣ם <S%H3318><s%> out אֵלֵ֔ינוּ <S%H413><s%> to וְנֵדְעָ֖ה <S%H3045><s%> unto us that we may know אֹתָֽם׃ <S%H853><s%>

וַיֵּצֵ֧א <S%H3318><s%> went out אֲלֵהֶ֛ם <S%H413><s%> But ל֖וֹט <S%H3876><s%> And Lot הַפֶּ֑תְחָה <S%H6607><s%> at the door וְהַדֶּ֖לֶת <S%H1817><s%> the door סָגַ֥ר <S%H5462><s%> unto them and shut אַחֲרָֽיו׃ <S%H310><s%> after him
וַיֹּאמַ֑ר <S%H559><s%> And said אַל־ <S%H408><s%> nay נָ֥א <S%H4994><s%> Please אַחַ֖י <S%H251><s%> I pray you brethren תָּרֵֽעוּ׃ <S%H7489><s%> do not so wickedly

הִנֵּה־ <S%H2009><s%> behold נָ֨א <S%H4994><s%> Now לִ֜י שְׁתֵּ֣י <S%H8147><s%> Behold now I have two בָנ֗וֹת <S%H1323><s%> daughters אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> who לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> have not יָדְעוּ֙ <S%H3045><s%> which have not known אִ֔ישׁ <S%H376><s%> man אוֹצִֽיאָה־ <S%H3318><s%> let me I pray you bring them out נָּ֤א <S%H4994><s%> please אֶתְהֶן֙ <S%H853><s%> אֲלֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H413><s%> to וַעֲשׂ֣וּ <S%H6213><s%> unto you and do לָהֶ֔ן כַּטּ֖וֹב <S%H2896><s%> ye to them as [is] good בְּעֵינֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H5869><s%> in your eyes רַ֠ק <S%H7535><s%> but לָֽאֲנָשִׁ֤ים <S%H376><s%> men הָאֵל֙ <S%H411><s%> only unto these אַל־ <S%H408><s%> nay תַּעֲשׂ֣וּ <S%H6213><s%> do דָבָ֔ר <S%H1697><s%> act כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כֵּ֥ן <S%H3651><s%> as they בָּ֖אוּ <S%H935><s%> for therefore came בְּצֵ֥ל <S%H6738><s%> they under the shadow קֹרָתִֽי׃ <S%H6982><s%> of my roof

וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ ׀ <S%H559><s%> And they said גֶּשׁ־ <S%H5066><s%> Stand הָ֗לְאָה <S%H1973><s%> back וַיֹּֽאמְרוּ֙ <S%H559><s%> And they said הָאֶחָ֤ד <S%H259><s%> [again] This one בָּֽא־ <S%H935><s%> [fellow] came in לָגוּר֙ <S%H1481><s%> to sojourn וַיִּשְׁפֹּ֣ט <S%H8199><s%> and he will needs שָׁפ֔וֹט <S%H8199><s%> be a judge עַתָּ֕ה <S%H6258><s%> now נָרַ֥ע <S%H7489><s%> now will we deal worse לְךָ֖ מֵהֶ֑ם <S%H1992><s%> they וַיִּפְצְר֨וּ <S%H6484><s%> with thee than with them And they pressed בָאִ֤ישׁ <S%H582><s%> against בְּלוֹט֙ <S%H3876><s%> [even] Lot מְאֹ֔ד <S%H3966><s%> sore וַֽיִּגְּשׁ֖וּ <S%H5066><s%> and came near לִשְׁבֹּ֥ר <S%H7665><s%> to break הַדָּֽלֶת׃ <S%H1817><s%> the door

וַיִּשְׁלְח֤וּ <S%H7971><s%> put forth הָֽאֲנָשִׁים֙ <S%H376><s%> the men אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יָדָ֔ם <S%H3027><s%> their hand וַיָּבִ֧יאוּ <S%H935><s%> and pulled אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ל֛וֹט <S%H3876><s%> Lot אֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H413><s%> into הַבָּ֑יְתָה <S%H1004><s%> into the house וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַדֶּ֖לֶת <S%H1817><s%> to the door סָגָֽרוּ׃ <S%H5462><s%> to them and shut

וְֽאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאֲנָשִׁ֞ים <S%H376><s%> the men אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who פֶּ֣תַח <S%H6607><s%> that [were] at the door הַבַּ֗יִת <S%H1004><s%> of the house הִכּוּ֙ <S%H5221><s%> And they smote בַּסַּנְוֵרִ֔ים <S%H5575><s%> with blindness מִקָּטֹ֖ן <S%H6996><s%> both small וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against גָּד֑וֹל <S%H1419><s%> and great וַיִּלְא֖וּ <S%H3811><s%> so that they wearied לִמְצֹ֥א <S%H4672><s%> themselves to find הַפָּֽתַח׃ <S%H6607><s%> the door

וַיֹּאמְר֨וּ <S%H559><s%> said הָאֲנָשִׁ֜ים <S%H376><s%> the men אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to ל֗וֹט <S%H3876><s%> unto Lot עֹ֚ד <S%H5750><s%> else מִֽי־ <S%H4310><s%> any לְךָ֣ פֹ֔ה <S%H6311><s%> Hast thou here חָתָן֙ <S%H2860><s%> besides? son in law וּבָנֶ֣יךָ <S%H1121><s%> and thy sons וּבְנֹתֶ֔יךָ <S%H1323><s%> and thy daughters וְכֹ֥ל <S%H3605><s%> all manner אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> and whatsoever לְךָ֖ בָּעִ֑יר <S%H5892><s%> thou hast in the city הוֹצֵ֖א <S%H3318><s%> bring [them] out מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> at הַמָּקֽוֹם׃ <S%H4725><s%> of this place

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> because מַשְׁחִתִ֣ים <S%H7843><s%> us to destroy אֲנַ֔חְנוּ <S%H587><s%> For we אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמָּק֖וֹם <S%H4725><s%> this place הַזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> this כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> so גָֽדְלָ֤ה <S%H1431><s%> is waxen great צַעֲקָתָם֙ <S%H6818><s%> because the cry of them אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> before פְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> the face יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וַיְשַׁלְּחֵ֥נוּ <S%H7971><s%> hath sent יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> and the LORD לְשַׁחֲתָֽהּ׃ <S%H7843><s%> to destroy

וַיֵּצֵ֨א <S%H3318><s%> went out ל֜וֹט <S%H3876><s%> And Lot וַיְדַבֵּ֣ר ׀ <S%H1696><s%> and spake אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to his חֲתָנָ֣יו ׀ <S%H2860><s%> unto his sons in law לֹקְחֵ֣י <S%H3947><s%> which married בְנֹתָ֗יו <S%H1323><s%> his daughters וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> and said ק֤וּמוּ <S%H6965><s%> Up צְּאוּ֙ <S%H3318><s%> get you out מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> at הַמָּק֣וֹם <S%H4725><s%> of this place הַזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> of this כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for מַשְׁחִ֥ית <S%H7843><s%> will destroy יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> for the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעִ֑יר <S%H5892><s%> this city וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> become כִמְצַחֵ֖ק <S%H6711><s%> But he seemed as one that mocked בְּעֵינֵ֥י <S%H5869><s%> unto חֲתָנָֽיו׃ <S%H2860><s%> his sons in law

וּכְמוֹ֙ <S%H3644><s%> And when הַשַּׁ֣חַר <S%H7837><s%> the morning עָלָ֔ה <S%H5927><s%> arose וַיָּאִ֥יצוּ <S%H213><s%> hastened הַמַּלְאָכִ֖ים <S%H4397><s%> then the angels בְּל֣וֹט <S%H3876><s%> Lot לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying קוּם֩ <S%H6965><s%> Arise קַ֨ח <S%H3947><s%> take אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> אִשְׁתְּךָ֜ <S%H802><s%> thy wife וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁתֵּ֤י <S%H8147><s%> and thy two בְנֹתֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H1323><s%> daughters הַנִּמְצָאֹ֔ת <S%H4672><s%> which are here פֶּן־ <S%H6435><s%> or תִּסָּפֶ֖ה <S%H5595><s%> lest thou be consumed בַּעֲוֹ֥ן <S%H5771><s%> in the iniquity הָעִֽיר׃ <S%H5892><s%> of the city

וַֽיִּתְמַהְמָ֓הּ ׀ <S%H4102><s%> And while he lingered וַיַּחֲזִ֨קוּ <S%H2388><s%> laid hold הָאֲנָשִׁ֜ים <S%H376><s%> the men בְּיָד֣וֹ <S%H3027><s%> upon his hand וּבְיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> and upon the hand אִשְׁתּ֗וֹ <S%H802><s%> of his wife וּבְיַד֙ <S%H3027><s%> and upon the hand שְׁתֵּ֣י <S%H8147><s%> of his two בְנֹתָ֔יו <S%H1323><s%> daughters בְּחֶמְלַ֥ת <S%H2551><s%> being merciful יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD עָלָ֑יו <S%H5921><s%> and they וַיֹּצִאֻ֥הוּ <S%H3318><s%> unto him and they brought him forth וַיַּנִּחֻ֖הוּ <S%H3240><s%> and set him מִח֥וּץ <S%H2351><s%> without לָעִֽיר׃ <S%H5892><s%> the city

וַיְהִי֩ <S%H1961><s%> become כְהוֹצִיאָ֨ם <S%H3318><s%> And it came to pass when they had brought them forth אֹתָ֜ם <S%H853><s%> הַח֗וּצָה <S%H2351><s%> abroad וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> that he said הִמָּלֵ֣ט <S%H4422><s%> Escape עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> for נַפְשֶׁ֔ךָ <S%H5315><s%> thy life אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תַּבִּ֣יט <S%H5027><s%> look אַחֲרֶ֔יךָ <S%H310><s%> not behind thee וְאַֽל־ <S%H408><s%> not תַּעֲמֹ֖ד <S%H5975><s%> neither stay בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> anywhere הַכִּכָּ֑ר <S%H3603><s%> thou in all the plain הָהָ֥רָה <S%H2022><s%> to the mountain הִמָּלֵ֖ט <S%H4422><s%> escape פֶּן־ <S%H6435><s%> or תִּסָּפֶֽה׃ <S%H5595><s%> lest thou be consumed
וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said ל֖וֹט <S%H3876><s%> And Lot אֲלֵהֶ֑ם <S%H413><s%> about אַל־ <S%H408><s%> no נָ֖א <S%H4994><s%> Oh אֲדֹנָֽי׃ <S%H136><s%> my lords

הִנֵּה־ <S%H2009><s%> behold נָ֠א <S%H4994><s%> Now מָצָ֨א <S%H4672><s%> hath found עַבְדְּךָ֣ <S%H5650><s%> Behold now thy servant חֵן֮ <S%H2580><s%> grace בְּעֵינֶיךָ֒ <S%H5869><s%> in thy sight וַתַּגְדֵּ֣ל <S%H1431><s%> and thou hast magnified חַסְדְּךָ֗ <S%H2617><s%> thy mercy אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> which עָשִׂ֙יתָ֙ <S%H6213><s%> which thou hast shewed עִמָּדִ֔י <S%H5978><s%> unto me לְהַחֲי֖וֹת <S%H2421><s%> in saving אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נַפְשִׁ֑י <S%H5315><s%> my life וְאָנֹכִ֗י <S%H595><s%> I לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> and I אוּכַל֙ <S%H3201><s%> and I cannot לְהִמָּלֵ֣ט <S%H4422><s%> escape הָהָ֔רָה <S%H2022><s%> to the mountain פֶּן־ <S%H6435><s%> lest תִּדְבָּקַ֥נִי <S%H1692><s%> take הָרָעָ֖ה <S%H7451><s%> lest some evil וָמַֽתִּי׃ <S%H4191><s%> me and I die

הִנֵּה־ <S%H2009><s%> behold נָ֠א <S%H4994><s%> now הָעִ֨יר <S%H5892><s%> Behold now this city הַזֹּ֧את <S%H2063><s%> likewise קְרֹבָ֛ה <S%H7138><s%> [is] near לָנ֥וּס <S%H5127><s%> to flee שָׁ֖מָּה <S%H8033><s%> there וְהִ֣יא <S%H1931><s%> unto and it מִצְעָ֑ר <S%H4705><s%> [is] a little one אִמָּלְטָ֨ה <S%H4422><s%> Oh let me escape נָּ֜א <S%H4994><s%> Please שָׁ֗מָּה <S%H8033><s%> there הֲלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not מִצְעָ֛ר <S%H4705><s%> is small הִ֖וא <S%H1931><s%> he וּתְחִ֥י <S%H2421><s%> shall live נַפְשִֽׁי׃ <S%H5315><s%> He

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said אֵלָ֔יו <S%H413><s%> to him הִנֵּה֙ <S%H2009><s%> unto him See נָשָׂ֣אתִי <S%H5375><s%> I have accepted פָנֶ֔יךָ <S%H6440><s%> thee גַּ֖ם <S%H1571><s%> also לַדָּבָ֣ר <S%H1697><s%> concerning this thing הַזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> this לְבִלְתִּ֛י <S%H1115><s%> not הָפְכִּ֥י <S%H2015><s%> also that I will not overthrow אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעִ֖יר <S%H5892><s%> this city אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> for the which דִּבַּֽרְתָּ׃ <S%H1696><s%> thou hast spoken

מַהֵר֙ <S%H4116><s%> Haste הִמָּלֵ֣ט <S%H4422><s%> thee escape שָׁ֔מָּה <S%H8033><s%> there כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> not אוּכַל֙ <S%H3201><s%> thither for I cannot לַעֲשׂ֣וֹת <S%H6213><s%> do דָּבָ֔ר <S%H1697><s%> any thing עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until בֹּאֲךָ֖ <S%H935><s%> till thou be come שָׁ֑מָּה <S%H8033><s%> there עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כֵּ֛ן <S%H3651><s%> after that קָרָ֥א <S%H7121><s%> was called שֵׁם־ <S%H8034><s%> thither Therefore the name הָעִ֖יר <S%H5892><s%> of the city צֽוֹעַר׃ <S%H6820><s%> Zoar
